languages.text: "Именно!" {n}— шумно выдыхает Абеляр, но тотчас заметно успокаивается.{/n} "Вам просто нужно было положиться на меня".
"I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."
languages.original_text: "Именно!" {n}— шумно выдыхает Абеляр, но тотчас заметно успокаивается.{/n} "Вам просто нужно было положиться на меня".

traits.locale_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."

traits.locale_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我也是这么想的！”{n}阿贝拉德叹了口气，但明显地放松了下来。{/n}“您只要相信我就好。”
languages.original_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."

traits.locale_text: “我也是这么想的！”{n}阿贝拉德叹了口气，但明显地放松了下来。{/n}“您只要相信我就好。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¡Eso espero!». {n}Abelard suspira, pero se relaja a todas luces.{/n} «Solo tenía que confiar en mí».
languages.original_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso espero!». {n}Abelard suspira, pero se relaja a todas luces.{/n} «Solo tenía que confiar en mí».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだと言わざるを得ません」{n}アベラルドは重々しくためいきをついたが、目に見えて気分は和らいだようだ。{/n}「あなたには、ただ我を信頼していただきたかった」
languages.original_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだと言わざるを得ません」{n}アベラルドは重々しくためいきをついたが、目に見えて気分は和らいだようだ。{/n}「あなたには、ただ我を信頼していただきたかった」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Das will ich meinen!" {n}Abelard stößt einen Seufzer aus, wirkt aber sichtlich entspannter.{/n} "Ihr hättet mir einfach nur vertrauen müssen."
languages.original_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."

traits.locale_text: "Das will ich meinen!" {n}Abelard stößt einen Seufzer aus, wirkt aber sichtlich entspannter.{/n} "Ihr hättet mir einfach nur vertrauen müssen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire ! » {n}Abélard pousse un soupir las, l'air visiblement plus détendu.{/n} « J'espère seulement que vous me ferez confiance, à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire ! » {n}Abélard pousse un soupir las, l'air visiblement plus détendu.{/n} « J'espère seulement que vous me ferez confiance, à l'avenir. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Öyleyim tabii." {n}Abelard iç çekse de rahatladığını görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Bana birazcık güvenseniz!"
languages.original_text: "I should say so!" {n}Abelard heaves a sigh, but he visibly relaxes.{/n} "You simply needed to trust me."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyim tabii." {n}Abelard iç çekse de rahatladığını görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Biraz güven yahu!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
